title: Home Page
description: Sharing principles of Chinese medicine and Qigong classes for natural healing. Experience meditation, healthy eating and great health.
cleaned_text: Group Qigong practice continues on Thursday evenings, [7:30 PM (ET) over Zoom](https://www.tcmworld.org/events/) This website uses cookies so that we can provide you with the best user experience possible. Cookie information is stored in your browser and performs functions such as recognising you when you return to our website and helping our team to understand which sections of the website you find most interesting and useful.
